channel.title: personal on Subhrajyoti Sen
channel.description: Recent content in personal on Subhrajyoti Sen

item.title: About Me
item.description: Hey there :) I am an Android Developer currently working at KeepTruckin. Prior to this, I lead the team building the Tickertape Android app. I am also an Open Source enthusiast and an active contributor. One of the biggest projects I worked on is Firefox Focus. For more details on my career, you can take a look at my resume. I used to conduct research on recognizing handwritten Kannada documents. You can find one of the papers on IEEEXplore.

item.title: Public Speaking
item.description: Whenever possible, I try my best to share my learning by speaking at conferences. I have been very fortunate to be able to speak at multiple international conferences and meetups. 2021 Android Worldwide 2021- Journey Of Time Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pVbcFFM6jFs&feature=youtu.be Slides: https://speakerdeck.com/subhrajyotisen/journey-of-time BlrDroid Jan 2021 - Demystifying Styles and Themes Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T3TvE2-efPo Slides: https://speakerdeck.com/subhrajyotisen/demystifying-styles-and-themes 2020 BlrDroid May 2020 - Building a better codebase with Lint Link: https://www.
